title: Advanced Language MOOC for Real-World Application: Simulation-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and fundamental digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: Scenario-Based Language Learning via Smartphone Access: Emphasis on Authentic Communication Contexts

learning_goals: Learners can accurately perform daily conversational tasks (e.g., shopping, travel, emergencies) in the target language with over 80% accuracy in a simulated environment.
Learners can utilize at least three language expressions that consider cultural context through VR-based role-playing.
Learners can achieve a score of 70 or above (out of 100) on the weekly comprehensive assessment to demonstrate language application skills.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
